snippet: Some employees could have to spend money they set aside last year by March 15, depending on their employer’s program.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column warns that important deadline for flexible health care spending accounts is coming on March 15; date marks end of grace period by which employees must spend money set aside previous year; any money left over is forfeited.
lead_paragraph: Some employees could have to spend money they set aside last year by March 15, depending on their employer’s program.

headline.print_headline: A Flexible Spending Account Deadline May Be Near
headline.main: A Flexible Spending Account Deadline May Be Near
